item.description:
Hello ladies, I just want to send out the info for Tantra Lounge party...
It begins at 9 pm, but you can get there when you wish. Just give me a call to let me know what time you will be attending. You must purchase your tickets yourself from this site: http://www.tantraloun...
Click Add to Cart at the bottom, and you can purchase your ticket. The event is $25 in advance and you get admission, champaign toast, and a continental breakfast. It's open bar from 9pm-1 a.m
I will send out another email on Wednesday night with details where I will be and my phone number so please look out for a second email on Wednesday. [Please RSVP Yes once you have purchased your ticket from the site, and right in a comment that you have purchased your ticket !
Thanks! And please see Tantra's info below.

Tantra Lounge "NEW YEARS EVE 2009"
Type:
Party - Holiday Party
Network:
Global
Start Time:
Thursday, December 31, 2009 at 9:00pm
End Time:
Friday, January 1, 2010 at 4:00am
Location:
35-50 31st Street Astoria NY. 11106
Description
Tantra Lounge will ring in 2010 with our best party of the year

DJ RICHY RICH will spin thoughout the evening taking you on a musical journey

Ticket Price

$25 in Advance - Open Bar 9pm - 1 am
$35 @ the door - Open Bar 9pm - 1am
$20 Cover After 1am
Buy Tickets Online: www.tantraloungenyc.com/ticketssale.htm



Complimentary champagne toast at midnight...
Noisemakers & Grapes.

www.tantraloungenyc.com
rsvp@tantraloungenyc.com
PHONE: 718.937.4574
SPACE IS LIMITED
item.how_to_find_us: My location will be disclosed in Wednesday's email
item.name: New Years Eve Outing!!
